thread.title: 'The bottles kept coming': How the Kim-Trump summit began

title: 'The bottles kept coming': How the Kim-Trump summit began
text:
'The bottles kept coming': How the Kim-Trump summit began 4:16pm IST - 01:36 
Kim Jong Un is said to have made jokes about himself and served a flood of liquor and noodles during the meeting with South Korean officials that sparked talk of a meeting with U.S. President Donald Trump. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
